variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a premature stop codon in the protein, leading to a truncated and likely non-functional P53 protein.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_000546.4:c.721G>A, p.(W241X) resulted in a truncated P53 protein, which was not detected by the antibody and confirmed by sequencing.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type P53 cDNA transfected into HeLa cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Mock-transfected (non-cDNA) HeLa cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis to compare the mean intensity of the bands between wild-type and variant samples.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Intensity of the P53 protein band greater than the background plus two standard deviations.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence or significantly reduced intensity of the P53 protein band compared to the wild-type control.
